definitions.definition: In an amazing manner; in a way that causes amazement ; wonderfully .
examples: That violin solo was played amazingly .

definitions.definition: Difficult to believe ; strange but true .
examples: Amazingly , no one was injured in the crash.
The car has amazingly low fuel consumption.

main_definition: In an amazing manner; in a way that causes amazement ; wonderfully .
secondary_definitions: Difficult to believe ; strange but true .
